sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import { Link, NavLink, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Sidebar.css'; const sidebarNavItems = [ { display: 'Dashboard', icon: , to: '/', section: '' }, { display: 'Add Slider', icon: , to: '/addSlider', section: 'started' }, { display: 'Slider Detail', icon: , to: '/sliderDetail', section: 'calendar' }, { display: 'User', icon: , to: '/user', section: 'user' }, { display: 'Orders', icon: , to: '/order', section: 'order' }, ] const Sidebar = () => { const [activeIndex, setActiveIndex] = useState(0); const [stepHeight, setStepHeight] = useState(0); const sidebarRef = useRef(); const indicatorRef = useRef(); const location = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { const sidebarItem = sidebarRef.current.querySelector('.sidebar__menu__item'); indicatorRef.current.style.height = `${sidebarItem.clientHeight}px`; setStepHeight(sidebarItem.clientHeight); }, 50); }, []); return

; }; export default Sidebar;
